程序包 src.main.java.CashFlowVisualization_story15

类 CashFlowController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.CashFlowVisualization_story15.CashFlowController
public class CashFlowController extends Object
Title : CashFlowController.java Description: Controller for the cash flow visualization view (Story15). Initializes pie and bar charts, loads transaction data for the current user from CSV, and animates the data display over time. Displays total income, expense, and net values, and updates charts dynamically. Ensures graceful shutdown of any scheduled tasks.

    void
    setTransactions(List<Transaction> transactions)
    Updates the controller's transaction list and refreshes the charts.
    private void
    setupCharts()
    Applies styling and titles to the PieChart and BarChart components, and styles the container background.
    private void
    setupLabels()
    Styles the labels for income, expense, and net values with colors and font settings.
    private void
    simulateDataReading(List<Transaction> transactionsList)
    Simulates incremental data loading by scheduling a TimerTask to reveal one transaction at a time every 2 seconds, updating the UI on the JavaFX thread.
    void
    stop()
    Stops any running scheduled tasks to prevent memory leaks.
    private void
    updateCharts()
    Recalculates totals and updates the pie and bar charts along with summary labels.

      public CashFlowController()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the view: sets up charts, labels, and loads transactions from the CSV file for the current user. Called automatically by FXMLLoader.

    • setupCharts

      private void setupCharts()
      Applies styling and titles to the PieChart and BarChart components, and styles the container background.

    • setupLabels

      private void setupLabels()
      Styles the labels for income, expense, and net values with colors and font settings.

    • setTransactions

      public void setTransactions(List<Transaction> transactions)
      Updates the controller's transaction list and refreshes the charts.
      参数:
      transactions - the list of transactions to display

    • updateCharts

      private void updateCharts()
      Recalculates totals and updates the pie and bar charts along with summary labels.

    • calculateTotalIncome

      private double calculateTotalIncome()
      Calculates the total income from the current transaction list.
      返回:
      sum of all income transaction amounts

    • calculateTotalExpense

      private double calculateTotalExpense()
      Calculates the total expense from the current transaction list.
      返回:
      sum of all expense transaction amounts

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops any running scheduled tasks to prevent memory leaks.

    • loadTransactionsFromCSV

      public void loadTransactionsFromCSV(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads transaction records from the given CSV file path, skipping the header. Parses each line into a Transaction object and starts the simulated display.
      参数:
      filePath - path to the transactions CSV file
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file

    • simulateDataReading

      private void simulateDataReading(List<Transaction> transactionsList)
      Simulates incremental data loading by scheduling a TimerTask to reveal one transaction at a time every 2 seconds, updating the UI on the JavaFX thread.
      参数:
      transactionsList - full list of transactions to display
